hero_section.headline: Turn Market Data Into Profit

problems.title: Manual Research Takes Forever

problems.description: Without real-time market intelligence, you're missing profitable arbitrage opportunities every day.

problems.title: Uncertain ROI Predictions
problems.description: Making sourcing decisions based on gut feeling instead of data-driven profit analysis.

solution_section.headline: Dealvoy: Your AI-Powered Profit Engine
solution_section.description: Transform how you discover, analyze, and source profitable products with advanced AI that works 24/7.

features.title: AI Deal Scorer
features.description: Get instant profit predictions with risk analysis and ROI calculations for any product.

features.title: Multi-Platform Scraping
features.description: Monitor prices across 28+ marketplaces including Amazon, Walmart, Costco, and wholesale sites.

features.title: Ungating Intelligence
features.description: Predict Amazon category approval success rates and get application requirements.

features.title: OCR Product Scanning
features.description: Scan any product with your phone camera for instant price comparisons and profit analysis.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen

testimonials.title: Retail Arbitrage Pro

testimonials.name: Jessica Park
testimonials.title: Sourcing Specialist
testimonials.quote: The mobile OCR scanner is a game-changer. I can evaluate deals instantly while shopping in-store.
